name: Orbital Wizardry
description:
A short boss battler created within 9 days for the Godot Wild Jam #46. 

Description: 

         Can you defeat all three bosses? Compete with 

         others and become a master of orbital wizardry. 

Controls:

        WASD or Arrow Keys to move

        Mouse changes player direction

        Hold left click to charge an orb and release it to fire. 

Credits:

        Carson_23: Code, and Music

        https://carson-23.itch.io/

        SmolSobug: Art and Sound effects 

        https://smolsobug.carrd.co/
